headline: Is Occidental Petroleum (OXY) Offering Value After A 1 Year Share Price Decline
summary: If you are wondering whether Occidental Petroleum is attractively priced or not, this article walks through the key numbers so you can judge the value for yourself. The share price closed at US$40.99 with returns of a 0.3% decline over 7 days, a 0.9% decline over 30 days, a 3.3% decline year to date and an 18.2% decline over 1 year, while the 5 year return sits at 94.8%. Recent attention on Occidental often centers on how large, established oil and gas producers fit into portfolios as energy...

headline: Occidental Petroleum (OXY) Closes Sale of Chemical Business to Berkshire Hathaway
summary: Occidental Petroleum Corporation (NYSE:OXY) is included among the 10 Best Natural Gas Stocks to Buy Right Now. Occidental Petroleum Corporation (NYSE:OXY) is an independent exploration and production company with assets primarily in the United States, the Middle East, Africa, and Latin America.
